entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1 except temperature rising to plus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1 except temperature rising to plus 3 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late in the evening and overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
